text:
Steve, the original question has an official answer, published here -
https://helpx.adobe.com/acrobat/kb/about-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html
 
In any case – not sure a new PS function is required for listing add/remove
programs, Get-Package is built in and provides heaps of details. 
Cheers, 
David
%40ausmarinetech.com.au

metadata.topic: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.email_text_original:
Steve, the original question has an official answer, published here -
https://helpx.adobe.com/acrobat/kb/about-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhelpx.adobe.com%2Facrobat%2Fkb%2Fabout-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C27b156dffca347386f5308dbf16faf37%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638369234214320995%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=meCqFxt7Du2yRkpHxAH0CWSe0rYRZybs6F%2FFvBLBFKs%3D&reserved=0] 
In any case – not sure a new PS function is required for listing add/remove
programs, Get-Package is built in and provides heaps of details. 
Cheers, 
David
